content:
會員委設建 庫 水 門 石 SHIHMEN
DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
本件保存
SDC - 5206
年
Mr. K. T. Li Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan
May 26, 11962 R
LGLIVE D MKIC TAIWAN JUN 71962
Subject : GSA Surplus Equipment Procurement
Dear Mr. Li:
It is recommended by MKA that the equipment and supplies as shown in the attached sheets are required by the Shihmen Project as extra insurance of realizing the present schedule of this Project. We, therefore, request your kind arrangement with AID/M to allocate these equipment and supplies to Shihmen Project.
Pertinent GSA Bulletins are enclosed herewith. Your earliest action on this matter will be highly appreciated.
女热 2
Very truly yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
W.IV.IL W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
51.6. 1 10881
Enclosures. GSA Bulletins
V.C. 83. 2
cc : Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/M
CUSA
國史饭 Academia Historica
281

It is recommended by MKA that the equipment and supplies
as shown in the attached sheets are required by the Shihmen Project

We, therefore, request your kind arrangement with AID/M to allocate

Mr. K. T. Li Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan

It is recommended by MKA that the equipment and supplies as shown in the attached sheets are required by the Shihmen Project as extra insurance of realizing the present schedule of this Project. We, therefore, request your kind arrangement with AID/M to allocate these equipment and supplies to Shihmen Project.
Pertinent GSA Bulletins are enclosed herewith. Your earliest action on this matter will be highly appreciated.
